|brand = Adtran |model = Bluesocket BSAP-2030 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = (1700948F1) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1750 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = enterprise access point |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = U2M-PCE4551AH, U2M-PCE3200AH, HDCWLAN203XF1 |icid = 2250A-WLAN203XF1 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 7016A0712004 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Freescale (NXP);P1010E;QorIQ, Version: 1.0, (0x80f90010); Core e500, Version: 5.1, (0x80212151); |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = Power ISA |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;FL512SAIF01; |flash1size = 64 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B1G1646G-BCH9; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = Atheros;AR8035-A; |eth2chip = Atheros;AR8033-AL1A; |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:19:92, 88:DC:96, |oui = 00:19:92, 88:DC:96,
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = Linux;2.6.35;;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, USB 2.0 |exp_minipcie_num = 2 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_poe_type = af |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, RJ45 console, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes, 16-pin header, EJTAG 1.2
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.190.1 |defaultlogin = adm1n |defaultpass = blue1socket |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Senao |manuf_model = IAP7260 |manuf_rev = AG |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/12/2014 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = B01LY9LRLM |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Senao PCE3300AH |rad1modif = Mini PCIe |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;AR9590-AR1A; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = Senao PCE4551AH |rad2modif = Mini PCIe |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9890-BR4A; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1300 |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *Silkscreen on the PCB reads 7016A0747004 Ver:1.00, per [[User:Slimey]]
*PCIe module: [[Senao PCE4551AH]] ([https://fccid.io/HDCWLAN203XF1/Label/ID-label-2263629 Label]) + [[Senao PCE3300AH]] {{see also|Senao PCE3300AN|Senao PCE4553AH|Senao}}
*FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/U2M-PCE4551AH U2M-PCE4551AH] - 3T3R 802.11an/ac PCIe Module :(Senao IAP7260AG - int. ant., Senao IAP7261AG - ext. ant.) :QCA9890-BR4A + [[Skyworks]] (''Sige'') SE5003L1 (5GHz) :AR9590-AR1A + [[Skyworks]] (''Sige'') SE2595L (2.4GHz) :OUI: 88:DC:96
==JTAG-Serial Info== ===JTAG=== 16-pin header, EJTAG 1.2 ===Serial=== {{/Serial info}}
==See also== ===Products=== :;[https://portal.adtran.com/web/page/portal/Adtran/group/4043 Bluesocket Family Access Points] *[[Adtran Bluesocket BSAP-1920]] - (2x2:2) Indoor Access Point *[[Adtran Bluesocket BSAP-1925]] - (2x2:2) Indoor Access Point *[[Adtran Bluesocket BSAP-1930]] - (3x3:3) Indoor Access Point *[[Adtran Bluesocket BSAP-1935]] - (3x3:3) Indoor Access Point *[[Adtran Bluesocket BSAP-1940]] - (3x3:3) Outdoor Access Point *[[Adtran Bluesocket BSAP-2020]] - 802.11ac (2x2:2) Indoor AP *[[Adtran Bluesocket BSAP-2030]] - 802.11ac (3x3:3) Indoor AP *[[Adtran Bluesocket BSAP-2035]] - 802.11ac (3x3:3) Indoor AP *[[Adtran Bluesocket BSAP-2135]] - 802.11ac (3x3:3) Outdoor AP *[[Adtran Bluesocket BSAP-3040]] - 802.11ac Wave 2 (4x4:4) Indoor AP *[[Adtran Bluesocket BSAP-3045]] - 802.11ac Wave 2 (4x4:4) Indoor AP
